https://tmrev.io/movie/388785-Day of Independence 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cl3ilal0i7RBAAbxbpjVoXI3HGz.jpg Zip, a 17 year-old Nisei (second-generation Japanese American) baseball pitcher, faces the tragic circumstances of the World War II internment of 110,000 Americans of Japanese ancestry. Set in a relocation camp in the summer of 1943, this film chronicles the journey of an American family torn apart by a forced and unjust incarceration, a father's decision that challenges his son to find strength, and ultimately his son's triumph through courage, sacrifice and the All-American game of baseball. Day of Independence
